course_description: Master Python basics through hands-on projects, progressing from installation to writing your first programs with confidence.
course_overview: This comprehensive beginner course takes students from zero programming experience to writing functional Python programs. Through interactive lectures, coding exercises, and real-world projects, learners will understand fundamental concepts including variables, data types, control structures, functions, and basic object-oriented programming. The course emphasizes practical application, ensuring students can immediately apply their new skills to solve problems and build simple applications.
target_audience: Complete beginners with no prior programming experience seeking to start their coding journey
prerequisites: Access to a computer with internet connection
learning_outcomes: Write and execute simple Python programs using variables, data types, and basic operators
Implement control flow structures including loops and conditional statements to solve programming problems
Design and utilize functions to organize code and promote reusability in Python applications
Read from and write to files using appropriate Python file handling techniques
Apply debugging techniques to identify and resolve common runtime errors
Create basic Python programs incorporating best practices for code organization and style
